fields.title: Entity Types
fields.description: List of entity types that this mob considers valid targets

subForm.description: List of entity types that this mob considers valid targets

fields.title: Cooldown
fields.description: The amount of time in seconds that the mob has to wait before selecting a target of the same type again

fields.title: Filters
fields.description: Conditions that make this entry in the list valid

fields.title: Max Dist
fields.description: Maximum distance this mob can be away to be a valid choice

fields.title: Must See
fields.description: If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice

fields.title: Must See Forget Duration
fields.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more

fields.title: Reevaluate Description
fields.description: If true, the mob will stop being targeted if it stops meeting any conditions.

fields.title: Sprint Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier for the running speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

fields.title: Walk Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

generated_doNotEdit.title: Nearest Attackable Target Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows an entity to attack the closest target within a given subset of specific target types.

fields.title: Attack Interval|attack Interval Min
fields.description: Time range (in seconds) between searching for an attack target, range is in (0, "attack_interval"]. Only used if "attack_interval" is greater than 0, otherwise "scan_interval" is used.

fields.title: Attack Owner
fields.description: If true, this entity can attack its owner.

fields.title: Entity Types
fields.description: Filters which types of targets are valid for this entity.

fields.title: Must Reach
fields.description: If true, this entity requires a path to the target.

fields.title: Must See
fields.description: Determines if target-validity requires this entity to be in range only, or both in range and in sight.

fields.title: Must See Forget Duration
fields.description: Time (in seconds) the target must not be seen by this entity to become invalid. Used only if "must_see" is true.

fields.title: Persist Time
fields.description: Time (in seconds) this entity can continue attacking the target after the target is no longer valid.

fields.title: Reselect Targets
fields.description: Allows the attacking entity to update the nearest target, otherwise a target is only reselected after each "scan_interval" or "attack_interval".

fields.title: Scan Interval
fields.description: If "attack_interval" is 0 or isn't declared, then between attacks: scanning for a new target occurs every amount of ticks equal to "scan_interval", minimum value is 1. Values under 10 can affect performance.

fields.title: Set Persistent
fields.description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player

fields.title: Target Invisible Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplied with the target's armor coverage percentage to modify "max_dist" when detecting an invisible target.

fields.title: Target Search Height
fields.description: Maximum vertical target-search distance, if it's greater than the target type's "max_dist". A negative value defaults to "entity_types" greatest "max_dist".

fields.title: Target Sneak Visibility Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplied with the target type's "max_dist" when trying to detect a sneaking target.

fields.title: Within Radius
fields.description: Maximum distance this entity can be from the target when following it, otherwise the target becomes invalid. This value is only used if the entity doesn't declare "minecraft:follow_range".

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
